price: (11) Indeed, when the water overflowed, We carried you [i.e., your ancestors] in the sailing ship[1739]
arabic: إِنَّا لَمَّا طَغَا ٱلۡمَآءُ حَمَلۡنَٰكُمۡ فِي ٱلۡجَارِيَةِ

version.title: English Translation - Saheeh International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English - Saheeh International - Al-Muntada Al-Islami (Islamic Forum)

meta.transliteration: innā lammā ṭaghā al-māu ḥamalnākum fī al-jāriyati
